front.title: A Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Event package for Peering

abstract.t: This document defines a new SIP event package for the exchange of SIP peering policies. It describes how SIP SUBSCRIBE/NOTIFY and PUBLISH methods can be used by SIP Proxies engaged in peering to exchange peering polices with minimal user or administrative intervention. It also provides a description of the surrounding architecture in the context of SPEERMINT.
